articles.author: Jackson Peck
articles.title: American hiker who went missing on Norwegian glacier rescued - NBC News
articles.description: An American hiker who hadn't been heard from for six days during a solo backpacking trip on a glacier in Norway has been found, the local Red Cross said on Wednesday
articles.content:
An American hiker who hadn't been heard from for six days during a solo backpacking trip on a glacier in Norway has been found, the local Red Cross said on Wednesday.
